basics.name: Peter Michaels Allen
basics.label: Design Systems Architect
basics.summary: Design systems leader with 18 years of design experience and 10+ years creating and managing design systems at scale. Bridges design and engineering to drive organizational transformation and measurable business impact. Combines expertise in user experience design, research, product management, and AI-driven development to deliver user-centric solutions for diverse and growing customer bases. Currently building DesignerPunk, a True Native cross-platform design system with mathematical foundations, 310+ tokens, 8,200+ tests, and an MCP Documentation Server achieving 82% AI context reduction.

references.name: James Carleton
references.reference: I've enjoyed working with Peter as we have collaborated on design systems at PayPal for the past 4+ years. He has shown strong leadership by creating and evolving the Venmo product design system. Peter is great at getting into UI details, he is eager to explore the best tools and methods to produce optimized design libraries. His effort helped guide leadership and raised the level of skill across the UX design organization.

references.name: PJ Onori
references.reference: Peter is the consummate systems designer. He has a strong understanding of the subject matter and an equally strong point of view on how to do the work. He's an equally strong analytical thinker and executor. He's able to take complicated/convoluted inputs and distill them into a cogent, useful, repeatable output. He's smart, outspoken, unafraid to challenge/question and unquestionably made the team better for it.
